des: "This is great to have on hand for sandwiches. Wonderful on whole wheat with lettuce or sprouts."
ins: In a food processor or blender combine cottage cheese, mayonnaise, yogurt, mustard, soy sauce, turmeric, Worcestershire sauce and vinegar.  Process until well blended.  Add tofu and pulse a few times, maintaining a bit of texture.  Stir in green onions.  Refrigerate for at least 3 hours to allow flavors to meld.
